 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּפַת‎</span> **verb** ==bind== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּפַת‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***form knots***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***twist into a knot***, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw together***, Assyrian [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kapâtu***</u></abbr>] II. ***bring together***); — 

**Pe\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּ פִ֫תוּ‎</span>, ([[BDB#W|W]]<sup>CG 224</sup>) [[Dan.3.21|Dan 3:21]] ***they were bound.*** **Pa\`el** ***bind: Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְכַפָּתָךְ‎</span> [[Dan.3.20|Dan 3:20]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> accusative of person); ***Passive participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְכַפְּתִין‎</span> ***bound*** v[[Dan.3.23|Dan 3:23]] v[[Dan.3.24|Dan 3:24]].
